statements: SELECT * FROM IoT_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM IoT_Data WHERE external_system_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, sensor_data->>'temperature' AS temperature FROM IoT_Data WHERE sensor_data->>'humidity' > '50';
SELECT * FROM IoT_Data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS data_count FROM IoT_Data GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY data_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoT_Data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, timestamp, sensor_data->>'temperature' AS temperature FROM IoT_Data WHERE sensor_data @> '{"temperature": "25"}'
SELECT DISTINCT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM IoT_Data GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100 ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT device_id, timestamp::DATE AS date, COUNT(*) AS records_count FROM IoT_Data GROUP BY device_id, date HAVING COUNT(*) > 50 ORDER BY records_count DESC
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM IoT_Data WHERE external_system_id = 1 GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 20 ORDER BY total_records DESC
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_location='Living Room';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_location FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type='Thermostat';
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_location='Kitchen' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'sensor' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_location = 'Room A' AND device_type = 'actuator';
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'sensor' AND device_location = 'Lab B';
SELECT device_name, device_location FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'sensor' AND device_name LIKE 'Temp%';
SELECT system_name, system_location FROM ExternalSystems WHERE system_location = 'Server Room' ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type='sensor';
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT system_name, location FROM ExternalSystems WHERE location LIKE '%USA%';
SELECT device_id, system_id, data_type FROM DataExchange ORDER BY exchange_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE location = 'Room 101';
SELECT system_name, location FROM ExternalSystems WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, system_id, exchange_time FROM DataExchange WHERE exchange_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';

SELECT device_name, system_name, data_type FROM IoTDevices JOIN DataExchange ON IoTDevices.device_id = DataExchange.device_id JOIN ExternalSystems ON DataExchange.system_id = ExternalSystems.system_id;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, location, status FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'Sensor';
SELECT system_name, connection_type FROM ExternalSystems WHERE status = TRUE;
SELECT exchange_timestamp, exchange_data FROM DataExchangeLogs ORDER BY exchange_timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, system_id, mapping_details FROM InteroperabilityMappings WHERE device_id = 1 AND system_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices WHERE device_type = 'sensor';
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoTDevices WHERE status = TRUE ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT system_name, connection_type FROM ExternalSystems WHERE status = FALSE;
SELECT log_id, exchange_timestamp, exchange_data FROM DataExchangeLogs ORDER BY exchange_timestamp LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM InteroperabilityMappings WHERE mapping_details->>'protocol' = 'MQTT';
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM IoTDevices WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, location_id, manufacturer FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, temperature, humidity FROM SensorData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 50;
SELECT system_name, system_type, endpoint_url FROM ExternalSystems WHERE system_type = 'API';
SELECT * FROM IoTDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC, manufacturer ASC
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, location_id FROM IoTDevices WHERE location_id = 3
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM IoTDevices JOIN Locations ON IoTDevices.location_id = Locations.location_id
SELECT system_name, system_type, endpoint_url FROM ExternalSystems ORDER BY system_type
SELECT device_name, temperature, humidity FROM IoTDevices JOIN SensorData ON IoTDevices.device_id = SensorData.device_id
